oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to colophon, copy completed in Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1278 AH [May 1862 AD].
Marbled paper over boards ; light brown leather over spine and corners.
MS Persian 69. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Persian with quotations in Arabic.
